title: Google News - Health - Fitness
description: Read full articles, watch videos, browse thousands of titles and more on the 'Health' topic with Google News.

items.title: Five-minute yoga stretches for a busy weekday
items.content_text: These stretches counter the current sedentary lifestyle and manipulate the spine in five different directions, thus maintaining a healthy spine and nervous system, says yoga teacher Kamini Bobde

items.title: Weight loss and cardio workout: Which is good for you, weight training  or HIIT?
items.content_text: The best outcomes will be seen if you combine the two modalities and divide your week into 2-3 days of 45 minutes of weight training and 1-2 days of 30 minutes of HIIT training. Combining both modalities with a sound nutritional plan and sufficient sleep, rest and recovery, you will lose weight, says functional medicine expert Vijay Thakkar
items.content_html: The best outcomes will be seen if you combine the two modalities and divide your week into 2-3 days of 45 minutes of weight training and 1-2 days of 30 minutes of HIIT training. Combining both modalities with a sound nutritional plan and sufficient sleep, rest and recovery, you will lose weight, says functional medicine expert Vijay Thakkar

items.title: New Study: Mental Fatigue Can Impair Physical Exercise
items.content_text: According to a recent study, individuals who engage in mentally taxing activities are likely to find it harder to go on to perform physical exercise. The researchers at the University of Birmingham's School of Sport, Exercise, and Rehabilitation Sciences conducted an experiment on a group of 16 m

items.title: ‘Don’t dance like men’: Exercise tips for women from a 19th-century manual

items.title: Exercise interventions found to ease Parkinson's motor symptoms |...
items.content_text: Both aerobic and non-aerobic exercise interventions can help to reduce the motor symptoms of Parkinson’s disease, a new meta-analysis found.
items.content_html: Both aerobic and non-aerobic exercise interventions can help to reduce the motor symptoms of Parkinson’s disease, a new meta-analysis found.
